publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3569 Jack McConnell: One World Action’s More Women More Power Campaign—That the Parliament notes that 8 March 2009 is International Women’s Day; is proud, but not complacent, that women represent a third of all members of the Scottish Parliament; is determined that recent progress in Scotland will not mean that the issue of women’s political representation falls off the agenda; considers that this issue is a matter of justice and democracy and is essential to tackling poverty and inequality; encourages MSPs to support One World Action’s More Women More Power campaign for greater political representation globally and in the United Kingdom, and calls for urgent action to implement Article 7 of the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women on ending discrimination in political and public life. Supported by: Elaine Murray*, Michael McMahon*, Cathy Jamieson*, Johann Lamont*, Sandra White*, David Stewart*, Marlyn Glen*, Patricia Ferguson*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Ken Macintosh*, Christina McKelvie*, Patrick Harvie*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Elaine Smith*, John Park*, Liam McArthur*, Ross Finnie*, Robin Harper*, Mary Mulligan*

S3M-3569 One World Action’s More Women More Power Campaign (lodged on 27 February 2009) Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Sarah Boyack*, Margaret Curran*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Angela Constance*, Bill Butler*, Stuart McMillan*, Pauline McNeill*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-3569 One World Action’s More Women More Power Campaign (lodged on 27 February 2009) Des McNulty*, Lewis Macdonald*, Jamie Hepburn*, Cathy Peattie*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Wilson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-3569 One World Action’s More Women More Power Campaign (lodged on 27 February 2009) Alasdair Allan*, Trish Godman*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-3569 One World Action’s More Women More Power Campaign (lodged on 27 February 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*, Cathie Craigie*, Rhoda Grant*
S3M-3569 One World Action’s More Women More Power Campaign (lodged on 27 February 2009) Michael Matheson*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-3569 One World Action’s More Women More Power Campaign (lodged on 27 February 2009) Karen Whitefield*, George Foulkes*
